title: Region defined by radical function, vert. lines part - c

content.description: Let R be the region bounded by the x–axis, the graph of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <msqrt> <mi>x</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3910@</annotation> </semantics> </math> , and the line x = 4.
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x–axis.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x–axis.

topic.text: 8.9: Volume with Disc Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
